title: App Store logs reference realityOS: Apple’s potential AR/VR operating system
content:
Rumors about Apple’s mixed reality headset have been surfacing for a while now. The company was initially expected to announce the product towards the end of this year. However, other reports published at a later date claim that Apple won’t be revealing its AR/VR headset until 2023. We can’t know for sure when the Cupertino

The post App Store logs reference realityOS: Apple’s potential AR/VR operating system appeared first on xda-developers.
description: App Store logs mention realityOS — Apple's potential AR/VR operating system that powers the rumored mixed reality headset.
